duties_responsibilities.duty: Fulfill patient care responsibilities including checking schedules, organizing patient flow, performing screenings, and charting.
Fulfill clerical responsibilities including completing forms, scheduling appointments, verifying insurance coverage, and managing patient charts.
Fulfill organizational responsibilities including responding to emergency codes, respecting patient rights, and sharing problems with the supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general equivalency diploma (GED), medical assistant diploma, or college course in medical assisting.
